data_meta.titleEn: Request for Late Check-out at a Hotel
data_meta.titleKo: Request for Late Check-out at a Hotel

sentences.speaker: David
sentences.sentence: Good morning, ma'am. How can I help you today?

sentences.speaker: Emma
sentences.sentence: Good morning. I was wondering if I could check out a bit later today.

sentences.speaker: David
sentences.sentence: Let me see... Normally, check-out time is at 11 am.

sentences.speaker: David
sentences.sentence: How much additional time do you need?

sentences.speaker: Emma
sentences.sentence: Could I possibly extend it to 1 pm?

sentences.speaker: David
sentences.sentence: Let me check with our housekeeping. Yes, that's fine.

sentences.speaker: David
sentences.sentence: Just please leave the room key at the front desk before you leave.

expressions.desc: Emma가 늦은 체크아웃을 허락해 준 David에게 감사의 의미로 이 표현을 사용합니다.
expressions.example_en: Thank you for your help. I appreciate it.

sentences.sentence: 안녕하세요. 오늘 좀 늦게 체크아웃할 수 있을까요?
나가실 때 키는 프론트 데스크에 두시면 됩니다.
